short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes quickly for the current page or custom URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This quick QR from URL generator lets you encode the current tab's URL or custom URL to 150x150 QR code with a click.

Generate a QR code for the active tab to save it or scan directly with your phone to open the same page there.

To save the qr image -- right click on the code generated and select "Save Image..." from the popup menu.

You can also set your own url (just select the respective option)
